ps3.2:1.3_0: Iddhiyā kati bhūmiyo, kati pādā, kati padāni, kati mūlāni?
ps3.2:1.9_0: Iddhiyā catasso bhūmiyo, cattāro pādā, aṭṭha padāni, soḷasa mūlāni.
ps3.2:3.3_0: Iddhiyā imā catasso bhūmiyo iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasībhāvāya iddhivesārajjāya saṁvattantīti.
ps3.2:4.3_0: Iddhiyā ime cattāro pādā iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasībhāvāya iddhivesārajjāya saṁvattantīti.
ps3.2:5.2_0: Chandañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṁ.
ps3.2:5.3_0: Chando na samādhi, samādhi na chando.
ps3.2:5.5_0: Vīriyañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṁ.
ps3.2:5.6_0: Vīriyaṁ na samādhi, samādhi na vīriyaṁ.
ps3.2:5.8_0: Cittañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṁ.
ps3.2:5.9_0: Cittaṁ na samādhi, samādhi na cittaṁ.
ps3.2:5.11_0: Vīmaṁsañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṁ.
ps3.2:5.12_0: Vīmaṁsā na samādhi, samādhi na vīmaṁsā.
ps3.2:5.14_0: Iddhiyā imāni aṭṭha padāni iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasībhāvāya iddhivesārajjāya saṁvattantīti.
ps3.2:6.12_0: Saddhāya pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ assaddhiye na iñjatīti—āneñjaṁ.
ps3.2:6.13_0: Vīriyena pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ kosajje na iñjatīti—āneñjaṁ.
ps3.2:6.14_0: Satiyā pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ pamāde na iñjatīti—āneñjaṁ.
ps3.2:6.15_0: Samādhinā pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ uddhacce na iñjatīti—āneñjaṁ.
ps3.2:6.16_0: Paññāya pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ avijjāya na iñjatīti—āneñjaṁ.
ps3.2:6.18_0: Iddhiyā imāni soḷasa mūlāni iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasībhāvāya iddhivesārajjāya saṁvattantīti.
ps3.2:7.3_0: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti;
ps3.2:7.5_0: tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati, seyyathāpi ākāse;
ps3.2:7.8_0: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;
ps3.2:7.9_0: imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjati;
ps3.2:8.1_0: Idhāti imissā diṭṭhiyā imissā khantiyā imissā ruciyā imasmiṁ ādāye imasmiṁ dhamme imasmiṁ vinaye
ps3.2:8.1_1: imasmiṁ dhammavinaye imasmiṁ pāvacane imasmiṁ brahmacariye imasmiṁ satthusāsane.
ps3.2:8.4_0: Bhikkhūti puthujjanakalyāṇako vā hoti bhikkhu sekho vā arahā vā akuppadhammo.
ps3.2:8.6_0: Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotīti pakatiyā eko bahukaṁ āvajjati,
ps3.2:8.6_1: sataṁ vā sahassaṁ vā satasahassaṁ vā āvajjati.
ps3.2:8.10_0: Yathāyasmā cūḷapanthako ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
ps3.2:8.10_1: evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti.
ps3.2:8.11_0: Bahudhāpi hutvā eko hotīti pakatiyā bahuko ekaṁ āvajjati;
ps3.2:8.15_0: Yathāyasmā cūḷapanthako bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti,
ps3.2:8.15_1: evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti.
ps3.2:9.1_0: Āvibhāvanti kenaci anāvaṭaṁ hoti appaṭicchannaṁ vivaṭaṁ pākaṭaṁ.
ps3.2:9.2_0: Tirobhāvanti kenaci āvaṭaṁ hoti paṭicchannaṁ pihitaṁ paṭikujjitaṁ.
ps3.2:9.3_1: seyyathāpi ākāseti pakatiyā ākāsakasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti.
ps3.2:9.9_0: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kenaci anāvaṭe aparikkhitte asajjamānā gacchanti,
ps3.2:9.9_1: evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati,
ps3.2:10.1_1: seyyathāpi udaketi pakatiyā āpokasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti.
ps3.2:10.7_0: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto udake ummujjanimujjaṁ karonti,
ps3.2:10.7_1: evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto pathaviyā ummujjanimujjaṁ karoti,
ps3.2:11.1_1: seyyathāpi pathaviyanti pakatiyā pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti.
ps3.2:11.7_0: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto abhijjamānāya pathaviyā gacchanti,
ps3.2:11.7_1: evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto abhijjamāne udake gacchati,
ps3.2:12.1_1: seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇoti pakatiyā pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti.
ps3.2:12.6_0: So ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti.
ps3.2:12.7_0: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto pathaviyā caṅkamantipi tiṭṭhantipi nisīdantipi seyyampi kappenti,
ps3.2:12.7_1: evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti,
ps3.2:13.1_0: Imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjatīti idha so iddhimā
ps3.2:13.1_1: cetovasippatto nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye āvajjati.
ps3.2:13.5_0: So nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye pāṇinā āmasati parāmasati parimajjati.
ps3.2:13.6_0: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kiñcideva rūpagataṁ hatthapāse āmasanti parāmasanti parimajjanti,
ps3.2:13.6_1: evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye pāṇinā āmasati parāmasati parimajjati.
ps3.2:14.1_0: Yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattetīti sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto brahmalokaṁ gantukāmo hoti,
ps3.2:14.13_0: Dibbena cakkhunā tassa brahmuno rūpaṁ passati.
ps3.2:14.14_0: Dibbāya sotadhātuyā tassa brahmuno saddaṁ suṇāti.
ps3.2:14.16_0: Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gantukāmo hoti,
ps3.2:14.17_2: sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gacchati.
ps3.2:14.18_0: Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gantukāmo hoti,
ps3.2:14.19_1: cittavasena kāyaṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gacchati.
ps3.2:14.20_0: So tassa brahmuno purato rūpiṁ abhinimmināti manomayaṁ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṁ ahīnindriyaṁ.
ps3.2:14.21_0: Sace so iddhimā caṅkamati, nimmitopi tattha caṅkamati.
ps3.2:14.22_0: Sace so iddhimā tiṭṭhati, nimmitopi tattha tiṭṭhati.
ps3.2:14.23_0: Sace so iddhimā nisīdati, nimmitopi tattha nisīdati.
ps3.2:14.24_0: Sace so iddhimā seyyaṁ kappeti, nimmitopi tattha seyyaṁ kappeti.
ps3.2:14.25_0: Sace so iddhimā dhūmāyati, nimmitopi tattha dhūmāyati.
ps3.2:14.26_0: Sace so iddhimā pajjalati, nimmitopi tattha pajjalati.
ps3.2:14.27_0: Sace so iddhimā dhammaṁ bhāsati, nimmitopi tattha dhammaṁ bhāsati.
ps3.2:14.28_0: Sace so iddhimā pañhaṁ pucchati, nimmitopi tattha pañhaṁ pucchati.
ps3.2:14.29_0: Sace so iddhimā pañhaṁ puṭṭho visajjeti, nimmitopi tattha pañhaṁ puṭṭho visajjeti.
ps3.2:14.30_0: Sace so iddhimā tena brahmunā saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṁ samāpajjati,
ps3.2:14.30_1: nimmitopi tattha tena brahmunā saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṁ samāpajjati.
ps3.2:14.31_0: Yaññadeva so iddhimā karoti, taṁtadeva hi so nimmito karotīti—
ps3.2:15.2_0: Sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa abhibhū nāma sāvako brahmaloke ṭhito sahassilokadhātuṁ sarena viññāpesi.
ps3.2:15.5_0: dissamānenapi heṭṭhimena upaḍḍhakāyena adissamānenapi uparimena upaḍḍhakāyena dhammaṁ desesi.
ps3.2:15.6_0: Dissamānenapi uparimena upaḍḍhakāyena, adissamānenapi heṭṭhimena upaḍḍhakāyena dhammaṁ desesi.
ps3.2:15.7_0: So pakativaṇṇaṁ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti,
ps3.2:16.2_0: Idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimmināti rūpiṁ manomayaṁ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṁ ahīnindriyaṁ.
ps3.2:16.8_0: Seyyathā vā pana puriso asiṁ kosiyā pavāheyya.
ps3.2:16.13_0: Seyyathā vā pana puriso ahiṁ karaṇḍā uddhareyya.
ps3.2:16.18_0: Evamevaṁ bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimmināti rūpiṁ manomayaṁ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṁ ahīnindriyaṁ.
ps3.2:18.8_0: ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā rūpasaññāya paṭighasaññāya nānattasaññāya pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti …pe…
ps3.2:19.7_0: “paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan”ti, appaṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati.
ps3.2:19.9_0: “appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan”ti, paṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati.
ps3.2:19.11_0: “paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyyaṁ sato sampajāno”ti,
ps3.2:20.2_0: Aniṭṭhasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ mettāya vā pharati, dhātuto vā upasaṁharati.
ps3.2:21.2_0: Iṭṭhasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ asubhāya vā pharati, aniccato vā upasaṁharati.
ps3.2:22.1_0: Kathaṁ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī viharati?
ps3.2:22.2_0: Aniṭṭhasmiñca iṭṭhasmiñca vatthusmiṁ mettāya vā pharati, dhātuto vā upasaṁharati.
ps3.2:22.3_0: Evaṁ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī viharati.
ps3.2:23.1_0: Kathaṁ appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī viharati?
ps3.2:23.2_0: Iṭṭhasmiñca aniṭṭhasmiñca vatthusmiṁ asubhāya vā pharati, aniccato vā upasaṁharati.
ps3.2:23.3_0: Evaṁ appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
ps3.2:24.1_0: Kathaṁ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno?
ps3.2:24.2_0: Idha bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
ps3.2:24.7_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
ps3.2:24.8_0: Evaṁ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
ps3.2:25.2_0: Sabbesaṁ pakkhīnaṁ, sabbesaṁ devānaṁ, ekaccānaṁ manussānaṁ, ekaccānaṁ vinipātikānaṁ.
ps3.2:26.2_0: Rājā cakkavattī vehāsaṁ gacchati saddhiṁ caturaṅginiyā senāya, antamaso assabandhagopurise upādāya.
ps3.2:28.8_0: Evaṁ tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi.
